Changelog
=========

1.0 (2015-02-19)
----------------

- add manifest [Mikel Larreategi <mlarreategi@codesyntax.com>]

- remove zopeskel [Mikel Larreategi <mlarreategi@codesyntax.com>]

- template details [Mikel Larreategi <mlarreategi@codesyntax.com>]

- layout [Mikel Larreategi <mlarreategi@codesyntax.com>]

- dependencies [Mikel Larreategi <mlarreategi@codesyntax.com>]

- vocabulary for apps [Mikel Larreategi <mlarreategi@codesyntax.com>]

- register indexer for boolean fields [Mikel Larreategi <mlarreategi@codesyntax.com>]

- translation [Mikel Larreategi <mlarreategi@codesyntax.com>]

- translations [Mikel Larreategi <mlarreategi@codesyntax.com>]

- change template [Mikel Larreategi <mlarreategi@codesyntax.com>]

- if price=true show price [Mikel Larreategi <mlarreategi@codesyntax.com>]

- changes in fields [Mikel Larreategi <mlarreategi@codesyntax.com>]

- faceted view [Mikel Larreategi <mlarreategi@codesyntax.com>]

- view [Mikel Larreategi <mlarreategi@codesyntax.com>]

- import from itunes [Mikel Larreategi <mlarreategi@codesyntax.com>]

- Google play import [Mikel Larreategi <mlarreategi@codesyntax.com>]

- initial implementation [Mikel Larreategi <mlarreategi@codesyntax.com>]
